name: nmap
description: Run an Nmap scan to detect open ports and services, including UDP, OS, aggressive, and vuln scripts.

name: masscan
description: Run a Masscan to perform fast port scanning.

name: nikto
description: Run Nikto to identify web server vulnerabilities.

name: rustscan
description: Run RustScan for fast port discovery.

name: sslyze
description: Run SSLyze to analyze TLS configurations.

name: gobuster
description: Enumerate directories and files on a web server using wordlists. Useful for discovering hidden resources. Example: file enumeration, directory bruteforce.

name: full_scan
description: Run full recon including port scan, fingerprinting and CVE enrichment.

name: run_workflow
description: Execute a predefined scanning workflow (quick_scan, web_scan, full_recon, network_discovery, vulnerability_assessment, ssl_audit).

name: list_workflows
description: List available workflow types and their descriptions.

name: get_workflow_status
description: Check the status of a running workflow by ID.
